name: Shove Knights
description:
Shove Knight!!!

Prototype 0.0.1

This is when two knights who carelessly lost their weapons had to resort some pushy tactics….

Red Player:

Movement: WASD

Push: "J" Or "~"

Blue Player: 

Movement: Arrow Keys

Push: "/" Or "Numpad 1"

Tip: The longer you charge the push, the more powerful.

Description:

Prototype game created for the Orange Lutheran High School Game Design/Development Club by two high school students.

A lot of room for improvements! Please bear with us for now. Real game scheduled to be released around March. 

Credits:

Programmer: Henry Turbedsky

Art/Animation: Xiaocong(Bill) Yan
